text: She may not be Victoria's Secret model, but she sure is an angel at heart. Chrissy Teigen showed off her'VS walk'as she presented the category for Reality Show of 2018 at the People's Choice Awards on Sunday. The 32 - year - old Sports Illustrated Swimsuit star put her modelling skills to work in front of the star - studded crowd in Santa Monica. Stunning : Chrissy Teigen did not disappoint as flaunted her legs and cleavage while strutting on to the People's Choice Awards stage on Sunday'That's was my VS walk.
